original_text: His body also was like the beryl, and his face as the appearance of lightning, and his eyes as lamps of fire, and his arms and his feet like in colour to polished brass, and the voice of his words like the voice of a multitude.
korean_text: 또 그의 몸은 황옥 같고 그의 얼굴은 번갯빛 같고 그의 눈은 횃불 같고 그의 팔과 발은 빛난 놋과 같고 그의 말소리는 무리의 소리와 같더라

sentences.original_text: His body also was like beryl
and his face as appearance of lightning
and his eyes as lamps of fire
and his arms and his feet like in colour to polished brass
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 팔과 발은 광택이 난 황동의 색갈 같았으며

sentences.original_text: and voice of his words like voice of a multitude
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말씀의 음성은 무리의 음성 같았더라
